section.title: Intended Audience
section.para: This guide is intended to individuals who want to develop standalone documentation to use within an OpenStack deployment. Using this tool chain will give you the look and feel of the mainline OpenStack documentation.

section.title: Who, What, Where, When and Why of pom.xml
section.para:
You will of noticed the pom.xml file at the root directory. This file is used to set the project parameters for the documentation. Including what type of documentation to produce and any post processing that needs to happen. If you want to know more about
pom.xml - need a link
then follow the link.
